title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Artist's
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (Artist's 

Resale Right) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (artist resale right) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 2. Regulation 8 of the European Communities (Artist's Resale Right)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 8 of the European Communities (Artist's Resale Right) 

Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 312 of 2006) is amended – 

(a) 

in paragraph (2) – 

(i) 

by the deletion of “make every effort to”, and 

(ii) by the substitution of “30 days” for “90 days”, and 

(b) 

in paragraph (3), by the substitution of “Circuit Court” for “High 
Court”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 July, 2022. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.. 

1 OJ No. L 272, 13.10.01, p.32. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [375] 3

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The Artist’s Resale Right allows creators of original works of visual and plastic 
art, through a system of royalty payments, to benefit from resales of those 
works when they are sold through the professional art market. 

These Regulations further amend the European Communities (Artist’s Resale 
Right) Regulations 2006 and will better support creators of original works of 
visual and plastic art in claiming resale royalties arising from the resale of 
works sold through the professional art market. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [375]
